I'd really love to be involved=
. I know many graduate students in the 
field, and a bunch of professors, i=
ncluding Varley, Friday, Hurst and 
Farris. Uh, and I know a bit Bryant too=
 :oP
If it's a serious project, they might be interested, perhaps.
